original: Håkanson, Erik Folke, direktör, Göteborg, f. 7/2/00 i Ystad av fabr. F. H. o. Anna Lundgren. G. 37 m. Maj Jonsson. Barm: Kerstin f. 38, Benigt 40, Britta 46. — Ysitads h. a. I, Malimiö hand:inst., DHS. Stud:res. t. Tyskl. 22 o. 28, USA (HHS stip.) 27-28 o. Engl. 33-34, därjämte ett flert. turist-res. t. olika europ. länder. Anst. v. Olof Perssons Hand. A-B i Ystad ISIS, korresp. h. A-B Rosenfors Bruk 18-19, tj :man i Stora Kopparb. Bergsl. A-B 19-25, aukt. rev. i Sthlm 29-34, chef f. Textilfabr. i Norrköp. 34-36, disp. v. Junex Konfektions A-B i Huskvarna 36-44, verkst. dir. i E. A. Rosengrens Kassaskåpsfabr. A-B i Gbg sed. 44. Styr :suppl. i sistnämnda bol. sed. s. å., led. av styr. f. Junexbol. 36-44, v. ordf. i styr. f. Jönköp. flygkl. Medl. av Par Bricole. Hobbies: friluftsliv, flygning, segling.
translated: Håkanson, Erik Folke, Director, Gothenburg, b. 7/2/1900 in Ystad to factory owner F. H. and Anna Lundgren. Married in 1937 to Maj Jonsson. Children: Kerstin b. 1938, Benigt b. 1940, Britta b. 1946. Earned a degree from Ystad high school, Malmo Business Institute, and DHS. Took study trips to Germany in 1922 and 1928, the USA (HHS stipend) in 1927-1928, and England in 1933-1934, as well as numerous tourist trips to various European countries. Employed by Olof Perssons Hand. A-B in Ystad ISIS, correspondent for A-B Rosenfors Bruk 1918-1919, officer in Stora Kopparb. Bergsl. A-B 1919-1925, authorized auditor in Stockholm 1929-1934, manager of textile factory in Norrköping 1934-1936, deputy director of Junex Konfektions A-B in Huskvarna 1936-1944, and managing director of E. A. Rosengrens Kassaskåpsfabr. A-B in Gothenburg from 1944. He was a board member (supplementary) of the latter company since the same year and a board member of Junexbol from 1936-1944, and Vice Chairman of the board for Jönköping flying club. He was also a member of Par Bricole and enjoyed outdoor activities, aviation, and sailing as hobbies.

hasOccupation.name: Olof Perssons Hand. A-B in Ystad ISIS
E. A. Rosengrens Kassaskåpsfabr. A-B in Gothenburg
